uuid.description: The unique identifier of the person.

itemType.description: The type of object.  In this case, a person.

revision.description: The revision number of the object.  This is used for version management.

prefix.description: Prefix of the person (Mr., Mrs., etc.)

slug.description: The machine-name "slug" of the person to use in its canonical URL.

images.description: A list of uuids of the image object associated to this person.

links.description: A List of objects containing URL and text title of link associated to the person.
